New Children's Movies & Music

New arrivals added to our Children's Movies & Music Collection in the last 7 days

View all on one page

Sign up for new Children's Movies & Music emails

Title Date added
Scooby doo and the witch's ghost by

Discover the chilling truth about a haunted New England town in Scooby Doo's eagerly awaited animated feature! When a world-famous horror-writer tracks down the gang, suspicious spirits are only the beginning!

 May 7, 2012
Saddle Club: Back in the Saddle by

May 2, 2012
Saddle Club Staying The Distance by

May 2, 2012
Saddle Club Horseback Riders by

May 2, 2012
Saddle club - the complete second season by

Follows the adventures of three young girls who formed the Saddle Club because of their love of horses. Episodes include: A Horse of a Different Color: Part 1and Part 2; Show Ponies: Part 1 and Part 2; The Ride of His Life; Love Is in the Air; Horsenapped; plus 19 more.

 May 7, 2012
Radio disney jams 15th b-day edition by

In celebration of its fifteenth anniversary, Radio Disney has compiled a collection of fifteen fan favorites, including songs from Selena Gomez, Hilary Duff, and Greyson Chance.

 May 7, 2012
Pokemon diamond and pearl. Sinnoh league victors. Set 2 by

Our heroes intervene in yet another Team Rocket scheme when Brock rescues a sleeping girl from a trip over a waterfall. Later, Ash and friends are suspicious when a Pokemon goes missing from a mysterious day care center-leading them to a surprise encounter with one of the Elite Four! Then Dawn gets the royal treatment when she exchanges places with a princess who looks just like her, but whether you're a princess or Pokemon Coordinator, life's never easy!

 May 7, 2012
Nick jr favorites vol. 6 by

Includes favorite episodes from Dora the Explorer; The Backyardigans; Blue's Clues; Wonder Pets; Little Bill; and Jack's Big Music Show, plus two never-before-released episodes of Jack's Big Music Show and Little Bill.

 May 7, 2012
Nick jr celebrates spring! by

Includes: Dora: Egg Hunt; Max & Ruby: Max's Chocolate Chicken; Little Bill: Mr Moth; Blue's Clues: Our Neighborhood Festival; and Rugrats: Bow Wow Wedding Vows.

 May 7, 2012
Nature jams by Farmer Jason.

May 7, 2012
Nancy Drew: Tomb of the lost queen by Her Interactive

May 2, 2012
My trip to the mountains by Kleiner, Lynn.

Sing, dance, and play along to these adorable songs about mountain critters, trees, camping, picnics, and more, accompanied by a variety of instruments, including banjo and ukulele.

 May 7, 2012
My first violin album by Various Artists.

From folk music to film music, the violin is the star of instruments. Here is the violin in the spotlight, listen to it sing! Includes songs Thais: Meditation, Fantasy on Carmen: Introduction and more!

 May 4, 2012
My first beethoven album by Various Artists.

Beethoven was a musical giant who created works that were both strong and serious while others were very gentle. This collection introduces young listeners to some of his greatest works.

 May 3, 2012
My first ballet album by Various Artists.

A bird dancing, an ox on a roof, flowers doing a waltz, a swan twirling about, what world is this? This is the magical world of ballet. The stage is full of people in colorful costumes, but nobody speaks. All the stories are told by music and dancing. Composers have written such exciting pieces for ballet, and this collection features some of the best.

 May 7, 2012
Mosquitoes are ruining my summer! and other silly dilly camp songs by

May 2, 2012
Mighty machines. : Super machines. Volume 1. by

Three episodes of the popular video series about trucks and machines.

 May 7, 2012
Mickey mouse clubhouse by

A collection of songs from and inspired by the top-rated Disney Junior show featuring Mickey. This album features the Grammy Award-winning artists They Might Be Giants.

 May 4, 2012
Max & Ruby. Max's Christmas Le NoeÌl de Max by

Max is full of questions when Ruby hurries to bed on Christmas Eve so Santa Claus can come. No one ever stays up to see Santa. No one except Max.

 May 4, 2012
Kidz bop christmas by Kidz Bop Kids.

Music for kids sung by kids. This 15-song collection includes popular Christmas tunes: It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year; Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree; Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer; and more.

 May 7, 2012
